publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2431 Brian Adam: Richards Pension Scheme—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to lobby the Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) to ensure that the DWP’s Financial Assistance Scheme comes into play to secure the pensions of former employees of Richards of Aberdeen. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Fiona Hyslop*, Shiona Baird*, Richard Lochhead*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2431 Richards Pension Scheme (lodged on 15 February 2005) Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-2431 Richards Pension Scheme (lodged on 15 February 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-2431 Richards Pension Scheme (lodged on 15 February 2005) John Swinburne*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
